name: Studious Adept
summary: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic.
description:
You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic. You gain humanoid form and mirror image as 2nd-level arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.Traits

Anadi: Anadis are peaceful, reclusive humanoids who live deep within woodlands, jungles, and other untamed areas of wilderness. Their natural forms resemble humanoid spiders covered in beautiful and distinctive markings of varying colors.
